system:
note description: "EiffelVision vertical box. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "container, box, vertical" date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_vertical_box_i.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_box_imp.xmlEV_BOX_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make, ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_makemake end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create a GTK vertical box. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Creation routine and initialization for Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_vbox_newgtk_vbox_new (../implementation_interface/ev_box_i.xml#f_default_homogeneousDefault_homogeneous, ../implementation_interface/ev_box_i.xml#f_default_spacingDefault_spacing)) ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_vertical_box.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_vertical_box_imp.xmlEV_VERTICAL_BOX_IMP
